p: This study was part of A. Ebelt's doctoral thesis and was supported by Laboklin. The authors are associated with either the Laboklin (Ebelt, Fuchs, Weber, MÃ¼ller) or PennGen (Giger) diagnostic laboratories which are offering blood typing. Reagents and kits were generously supplied for this survey by Alvedia (France) and DMS Laboratories (Flemington, US).
